dialogue.speaker: Alex

answer.label: Not much bro. You?
answer.text: Not much man. What's up with you?
answer.speaker: Isaac
answer.text: You know. Buisness. This whole update thing has been good. Lotsa people looking for a way to take their minds off it.
answer.label: update?
answer.speaker: Alex

question.speaker: Isaac
question.value: What do you think is going on?

answer.label: God
answer.text: Clearly the lord is working his will upon the world.
answer.speaker: Isaac

answer.label: Yes
answer.text: Yes. I have no doubts.
answer.label: father
answer.speaker: Isaac
answer.text: Well. You should go talk to Father Owens the next town over then. He'll probably have stuff you'd find interesting.
You can find the road there in the north west area, through the woods. You'll know its the right one cause it turns into a dirt road after a while.

answer.label: No
answer.text: Well, no. I'm not completely sure.
answer.speaker: Isaac
answer.text: Well. You should go talk to Charlotte Owens. She'll probably have stuff you'd find interesting.
You can find her in the retirement home on the western side of town. Its a huge brown building. Can't miss it.

answer.label: Nothing.
answer.text: This update means nothing. Life goes on. You know?
answer.speaker: Isaac
answer.text: I hear you man. And if it is something, what are we gonna do about it, right?

answer.label: Dunno
answer.text: I dunno man. But I'll tell you what man. I'm freaking out about it.
answer.speaker: Alex

question.speaker: Isaac
question.value: Well, you want something to make it go down easier?

answer.label: nah.
answer.text: Nah. I'm ok. I wanna know whats going on. Not ignore it.
answer.label: answers
answer.text: Well. You should go talk to Chief Duffy. I heard a rumour that he knows what's going on. Some sort of government thing.
You can find him in the North east area. But if you hit the college campus you've gone too far!

answer.label: Yes!
answer.text: Hell yes. I need to get my mind off this shit.
Well. You should go talk to Mike. I heard he's setting up an insane party at the college campus.
You can find him in the frat house on campus. The campus is in the north east area, and the frat is on the north western corner of campus.

answer.label: Worrying
answer.text: I'm worrying about this whole update thing. Especially Megan. I don't like to think that something might happen to her.

question.speaker: Isaac
question.value: Well, what are you gonna do about it?

answer.label: Dunno
answer.text: I don't know man. I gotta figure it out though. I guess I'm gonna go figure out what's going on.

answer.label: Use friends
answer.text: I guess I'm just gonna have to count on friends. I know you'll keep her safe man.

question.speaker: Isaac
question.value: And the rest of the gang too. You know we're family.

answer.label: Of course
answer.text: Thats true. I know all you guys have my back.
answer.speaker: Isaac

answer.label: sure
answer.text: Yeah... I guess.

answer.label: No
answer.text: I trust you man. The rest of them... No. Not with Megan.

answer.label: Your family
answer.text: Its your family. Not mine man.
answer.speaker: Isaac
answer.text: Fuck you man. It was supposed to be our family.

answer.label: Its Megan
answer.text: Its Megan man. I trust them with my life everyday. But this is Megan man. I barely trust her to myself.
answer.speaker: Issaac
answer.text: Alright. Alright. I hear yeah.

answer.label: pray
answer.text: Pray. The lord will provide for us.

dialogue.label: goodbye
dialogue.speaker: Alex
Isaac
dialogue.text: Cool. Be careful out there. You hear? I don't wanna end up taking care of Megan.
dialogue.speaker: Alex
dialogue.text: You got it bro. See you later.
